option.name: SCRIPT_TEXT
option.value: cat version.txt | awk -F. '/[0-9]+\./{$NF++;print}' OFS=. > tmp.txt; mv tmp.txt version.txt; export TAG=$(cat version.txt); docker-compose -f src/sheba/docker-compose.sheba.yml build; helm upgrade --install tmr chart/truemedicalreport --set global.debug=true --set global.baseDir=$(pwd) --set global.expose.host=localhost --set digest.sheba.input.type=internal --set dal.repository.tag=$TAG --set backend.repository.tag=$TAG --set frontend.repository.tag=$TAG --set digest.sheba.repository.tag=$TAG
